page.shortlink: dt netmailer Running a Netmailer Job
page.description: You can run Netmailer jobs by using the Netmailer Job Genie.

section.note: Netmailer is sold as an add-in to Alpha Anywhere. *[extlink:Contact sales@https://server.alphasoftware.com/alpha-software-contact-sales]* at Alpha Software for more information.

step.description: Start Alpha Anywhere and open a database.
Right-click on a table or set, and select Addins > Netmailer > Run Job. The Netmailer Job Genie appears.
Select the job you want to run, and click Next >.
Optionally, add additional record selection criteria.
